item.title: CVE-2024-31250|2024-04-12T12:56:39.277Z -- Saumya Majumder -- WP Server Health Stats
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Saumya Majumder WP Server Health Stats.This issue affects WP Server Health Stats: from n/a through 1.7.3.
